scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn setup:frontend && yarn setup:backend
scripts.dev: yarn clear && concurrently --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd frontend && yarn dev" "cd backend && yarn develop"
scripts.start: yarn clear && concurrently --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND,BOT" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "cd frontend && yarn start" "cd backend && yarn start" "cd bot && yarn dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
